name: Messenger of Peace
text: You grieve for the so-called civilized races, too many of whom are locked in useless, never-ending strife. Unless some brave soul steps forward to set a better example, constant warfare can only create more conflict. Thus you have laid down your weapons and spoken vows of nonviolence, hoping to find a civilized solution to the problems of mortals.

features.peacemaker'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, you gain a +4 bonus to attack rolls with attacks that don’t deal damage
features.vowOfNonviolence(11thLevel): When you hit with an attack that doesn’t deal damage, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn
features.auraOfPeace(16thLevel): Enemies within 2 squares of you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls

flavorText: Violence should be the last resort.
